verbs.description: [ARG0: The rapper] [V: took] [ARG1: to Facebook] [ARGM-PRP: to celebrate Donald Trump ’s victory] and said she was especially happy that he “ beat the liberal media ”
[ARG0: The rapper] took to Facebook to [V: celebrate] [ARG1: Donald Trump ’s victory] and said she was especially happy that he “ beat the liberal media ”
[ARG0: The rapper] took to Facebook to celebrate Donald Trump ’s victory and [V: said] [ARG1: she was especially happy that he “ beat the liberal media] ”
The rapper took to Facebook to celebrate Donald Trump ’s victory and said [ARG1: she] [V: was] [ARG2: especially happy that he “ beat the liberal media] ”
The rapper took to Facebook to celebrate Donald Trump ’s victory and said she was especially happy that [ARG0: he] “ [V: beat] [ARG1: the liberal media] ”
